national_anthem:
{{native phrase|es|[[National Anthem of Colombia|Himno Nacional de la República de Colombia]]|nolink|=|yes}}
( {{Lang-en|"National Anthem of the Republic of Colombia"}} )
[[File:United States Navy Band - ¡Oh, gloria inmarcesible!.ogg|center]]
image_map: COL orthographic (San Andrés and Providencia special).svg
official_languages:
[[Spanish language|Spanish]]
[[English language|English]] is also official in the [[archipelago of San Andrés, Providencia and Santa Catalina]].
leader_title3: [[President of the Congress of Colombia|President of the Congress]]
leader_title4: [[Supreme Court of Justice of Colombia|President of the Supreme Court]]
lower_house: [[Chamber of Representatives of Colombia|Chamber of Representatives]]
footnote_a: {{note|iboxa}} Although the Colombian Constitution specifies Spanish (''Castellano'') as the official language in all Colombian territory, other languages spoken in the country by ethnic groups – approximately 68 languages – each is also official in its own territory. English is also official in the [[archipelago of San Andrés, Providencia and Santa Catalina]].
footnote_b: {{note|iboxb}} The official Colombian time is controlled and coordinated by the [[National Institute of Metrology (Colombia)|National Institute of Metrology]]. Colombia is the oldest [[democracy]] in [[Latin America]], comprising thirty-two [[Departments of Colombia|departments]], with the capital in [[Bogotá]].
